about_the_game:
Maze Craze is a fast-paced, mind-wrecking puzzle platformer that takes the great concentration of your reflexes. Solve some complex mazes without hitting the walls - an error in judgment, and it's just a game over. Levels are never the same when you have dynamic music and bright graphics for an ample experience with each playthrough. Each of the mazes that this game offers is tougher than the last, which keeps you on your toes.

Key Features

  • High-speed precision gameplay
  • Map-induced dynamical music and colorful, graceful graphics
  • Infinite more tough mazes

Can you survive the maze?

name: Maze Craze

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable

short_description: Dash through hazardous mazes in this fast-moving, action-packed game! One wrong move, and it’s game over. No touching the walls!
